original_text: She spoke to Mary in a loud voice, ‘God has made you very happy. He has been good and kind to you more than to other women. He has also been good and kind to your baby.
korean_text: 큰 소리로 불러 이르되 여자 중에 네가 복이 있으며 네 태중의 아이도 복이 있도다

sentences.original_text: She spoke to Mary in a loud voice
He has been good and kind to you
He has also been good and kind to your baby.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 또한 당신의 아기에게도 좋고 친절하셨습니다.'
